title: The Chosen of Shar
content:
Shar - a huge, ancient temple dedicated to the dark goddess. Shadowheart will surely want to investigate further.

The Gauntlet of Shar is a Location in BG3 encountered in Act 2. Your actions here will be recorded for a related Companion Quest: The Chosen of Shar. To reach the Gauntlet of Shar, you have to be within the Reithwin Graveyard in Grand Mausoleum.
